casebody.data:
STATE
v.
THOMAS 2018-0796 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 26, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Appeal accepted on proposition of law Nos. II and III. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2017-1135, State v. Wintermeyer, and briefing schedule stayed. O'Connor, C.J., and French, J., would also accept the appeal on proposition of law No. I. Fischer, J., would accept the appeal on all propositions of law.

O'Donnell and Kennedy, JJ., dissent.
